daily_analysis.reasoning: The broader (30-50 candle) structure shows higher highs and higher lows from the left to right — a clear uptrend. Price is currently sitting near a recent short-term support area (~1.1545–1.1570), but I do not see a recent bullish engulfing pattern on the rightmost 20–30 candles to confirm an immediate buy. Recommend waiting for a bullish engulfing or clear bounce at this support before entering long.

m30_analysis.reasoning: A clear bullish engulfing cluster (a larger green candle absorbing the prior red into its range) is visible in the right-hand mid-late area of the M30 chart around the current price. The wick-to-wick zone (1.15700 down to 1.15480, narrowed to the core actionable 22-pip area) overlaps the Daily zone 1.1545–1.157, so inside_daily_zone = true. Pattern strength is moderate (not textbook perfect full-body engulf but a decisive bullish momentum candle covering the prior bearish candle and wicks).
